name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @AdrienneLaF: “So you can perhaps imagine how I was beginning to wonder, as the plane started banking toward its final descent, just what the hell was going on here.” https://t.co/0eF8XrbUCC

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Here I was, a potential disease carrier crossing a border, and nobody seemed interested or concerned enough to do anything about it. And none of them was taking the elementary precaution of mask wearing to protect themselves and one another."  @davidfrum:
https://t.co/rZ6amPJVCe

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @NickBaumann: “Calamity forces people to ask fundamental questions,” @DKThomp writes. “What is a community for? How is it put together? What are its basic needs? How should we provide them?” https://t.co/4U3NC71P2W

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Many young people navigating this pandemic are asking themselves a two-part health question: What are the odds that I get infected? And if I do get infected, is that really a big deal?" @DKThomp writes: https://t.co/yJuks6tZWA

name: TheAtlantic
text: Lawrence Weschler went searching for the story behind a mischievous and masterful 19th-century photographer’s sudden reemergence. What he found was far stranger than he could have imagined. https://t.co/fsWTNhrdKd

name: TheAtlantic
text: “The silence is resounding,” writes @DavidFrum. “And when such voices do speak, they typically describe a president utterly lacking in empathy to grieving families, wholly uncomprehending of sacrifice and suffering." https://t.co/XvlmNnmrK8

name: TheAtlantic
text: New #DearTherapist with @LoriGottlieb1: “I did my best to help our son have a rewarding life, as did his father, but the happy times were few, and his struggles were many and heartbreaking.” https://t.co/dWgeScZimz

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JamesFallows: By @Davidfrum, in @TheAtlantic, ‘Everyone Knows It’s True’
 
https://t.co/ZTqfC8CFjf https://t.co/Sr83I4iZPa

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @prashantrao: The ’Ndrangheta, Italy’s most powerful crime syndicate, has proved hard for prosecutors to crack, @RachelDonadio writes. Now one man is taking hundreds of accused mobsters to court. https://t.co/jSiAWNkYx9

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @davidfrum: Sarah Huckabee Sanders says it's not true.

Dan Bongino says it's not true.

First Lady Melania Trump says it's not true.

Notice who is *not* speaking up for Trump: current or retired senior officers, Gold Star families, wounded warriors. They know.

https://t.co/ur66mOZw5x

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @NickBaumann: The debate over reopening schools has focused on students and teachers. But school cafeteria workers, many of whom never stopped working, are also at risk, @giulia_heyward reports. https://t.co/VGI42jvrw1
